miot.api

类 DeviceManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • miot.api.Binding
      • miot.api.DeviceManager

  • public class DeviceManager
extends Binding
    This class provide the Miot device common logic.

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      static interface  DeviceManager.AddTimerCompletionHandler
      Callback interface used to deliver the result of add timer.
      static interface  DeviceManager.CompletionHandler
      Callback interface used to deliver the execution result.
      static interface  DeviceManager.DeviceListener
      Callback interface used to deliver device discovery result.
      static interface  DeviceManager.PowerConsumeHandler
      Callback interface used to deliver the power consume query information.
      static interface  DeviceManager.QueryFirmwareHandler
      Callback interface used to deliver the device firmware query results.
      static interface  DeviceManager.TimerListener
      Callback interface used to deliver timer query information.

    • 方法详细资料

      • bind

        public boolean bind()

      • onServiceConnected

        protected void onServiceConnected(ComponentName name,
                                  IBinder service)
        指定者:
        onServiceConnected 在类中 Binding

      • onServiceDisconnected

        protected void onServiceDisconnected(ComponentName name)
        指定者:
        onServiceDisconnected 在类中 Binding

      • addDeviceModels

        public int addDeviceModels(java.util.List<DeviceModel> deviceModels)

      • startDiscovery

        public int startDiscovery(DeviceManager.CompletionHandler handler,
                          DeviceManager.DeviceListener listener)
        start device discovery, the results will be delivered through DeviceManager.CompletionHandler, DeviceManager.DeviceListener
        参数:
        handler - callback the result of the discovery process executed in the xiaomi cloud are delivered
        listener - callback the device discovery result are delivered
        返回:
        0, if the discovery process was started successfully

      • stopDiscovery

        public int stopDiscovery(DeviceManager.CompletionHandler handler)
        stop device discovery
        参数:
        handler - callback the result of the stop discovery process executed in the xiaomi cloud are delivered
        返回:
        0, if the discovery process was stopped successfully

      • refreshDiscovery

        public int refreshDiscovery(DeviceManager.CompletionHandler handler)
        refresh device discovery, now mainly used to refresh the wifi device
        参数:
        handler - callback the result of the refresh discovery process executed in the xiaomi cloud are delivered
        返回:
        0, if the discovery refresh process was started successfully

      • takeOwnership

        public int takeOwnership(miot.api.device.AbstractDevice device,
                         DeviceManager.CompletionHandler handler)
        take the device's ownership.
        参数:
        device - the device to be taken ownership, it must be the wan device and ownerless
        handler - callback the result of the device's taken ownership are delivered
        返回:
        0, if the takeOwnership process are started successfully

      • disclaimOwnership

        public int disclaimOwnership(miot.api.device.AbstractDevice device,
                             DeviceManager.CompletionHandler handler)
        disclaim the device's ownership. Now only used to the Wan device, if succeed, the device will be become ownerless, but it still connected to xiaomi cloud.
        参数:
        device - the device to be disclaimed ownership.
        handler - callback the result of the device's disclaimed ownership are delivered
        返回:
        0, if the disclaimOwnership process are started successfully

      • queryFirmwareInfo

        public int queryFirmwareInfo(miot.api.device.AbstractDevice abstractDevice,
                             DeviceManager.QueryFirmwareHandler handler)
        query the device's firmware information
        参数:
        abstractDevice - the device to be queried the firmware information
        handler - callback the result of the device's queried firmware are delivered
        返回:
        0, if the queryFirmwareInfo process was started successfully

      • startUpgradeFirmware

        public int startUpgradeFirmware(miot.api.device.AbstractDevice abstractDevice,
                                DeviceManager.CompletionHandler handler)
        start upgrading the device's firmware
        参数:
        abstractDevice - the device to be upgraded the firmware
        handler - callback the result of the device's upgrading firmware are delivered
        返回:
        0, if the startUpgradeFirmware process was started successfully

      • queryFirmwareUpgradeInfo

        public int queryFirmwareUpgradeInfo(miot.api.device.AbstractDevice abstractDevice,
                                    DeviceManager.QueryFirmwareHandler handler)
        query the device's firmware ota upgrading information
        参数:
        abstractDevice - the device to be queried the firmware upgrading information
        handler - callback the result of the device's queried firmware upgrading are delivered
        返回:
        0, if the queryFirmwareUpgradeInfo process was started successfully

      • querySceneList

        public int querySceneList(java.lang.String deviceId)

        public int queryScene(java.lang.String sceneId)

        public int editScene(miot.typedef.scene.Scene scene)

      • queryTimerList

        public int queryTimerList(java.lang.String deviceId,
                          DeviceManager.TimerListener listener)
        query the device's timers
        参数:
        deviceId - the device's id which to be queried the timers
        listener - callback the result of the device's queried timers are delivered
        返回:
        0, if the queryTimerList process was started successfully

      • queryTimer

        public int queryTimer(int timerId)

      • addTimer

        public int addTimer(Timer timer,
                    DeviceManager.AddTimerCompletionHandler handler)
        add timer. see also Timer
        参数:
        timer - the timer to be added
        handler - callback the result of the timer added are delivered
        返回:
        0, if the addTimer process was started successfully

      • removeTimer

        public int removeTimer(int timerId,
                       DeviceManager.CompletionHandler handler)
        remove timer
        参数:
        timerId - the timer's id to be removed
        handler - callback the result of the timer removed are delivered
        返回:
        0, if the removeTimer process was started successfully

      • editTimer

        public int editTimer(Timer timer,
                     DeviceManager.CompletionHandler handler)
        edit timer
        参数:
        timer - the timer to be edited
        handler - callback the result of the timer edited are delivered
        返回:
        0, if the editTimer process was started successfully

      • queryPowerConsumption

        public int queryPowerConsumption(java.lang.String deviceId,
                                 int unit,
                                 long start,
                                 long end,
                                 DeviceManager.PowerConsumeHandler handler)
        query the device's power consume information with the time interval and the time unit
        参数:
        deviceId - the device's id to be queried power consumption
        unit - the time unit, see also TimeUnit
        start - the start time
        end - the end time
        handler - callback the result of the device's queried power consumption are delivered
        返回:
        0, if the queryPowerConsumption process was started successfully

      • modifyDevice

        public int modifyDevice(miot.api.device.AbstractDevice abstractDevice,
                        miot.typedef.property.PropertyList propertyList,
                        DeviceManager.CompletionHandler handler)
        modify the device's information, such as the device's name
        参数:
        abstractDevice - the device to modified information
        propertyList - the information to be modified
        handler - callback the result of the device's modified are delivered
        返回:
        0, if the modifyDevice process was started successfully
